benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/emails - Add account email

covered: Valid payload creation scenarios are covered (TC01, TC03, TC04, TC05) with 201 responses and correct body structure
Header handling scenarios cover required and optional headers (TC02, TC05, TC13)
Comprehensive validation coverage includes missing/invalid fields (TC10, TC11, TC12) and invalid accountId formats (TC07) and missing accountId (TC08)
Account existence and non-existence handling is tested (TC03 for accounts with/without emails, TC09 for non-existent accounts)

Error and status coverage across scenarios (400, 401/403, 404, 503) including malformed JSON (TC10), missing header (TC13), unauthorized access (TC14), not found (TC09), and service unavailability (TC15, TC19)
Security scenarios cover injection and XSS resistance (TC23, TC24)
Edge cases including extra fields (TC06), extra query parameters (TC18), and empty body (TC17)
Resilience and performance focus via slow/degraded DB (TC19), transient network failure (TC25)
Accessibility/documentation focus (TC27) and post-creation Location header verification (implicit in TC01/TC02/TC04)
gaps: Duplicate submission / idempotency handling for repeated POST requests is not explicitly tested
Rate limiting / throttling behavior is not tested
Caching behavior and related headers (e.g., ETag, Cache-Control) are not tested
Internal server error (500) scenarios beyond external dependencies are not explicitly covered
recommendations: Add an explicit idempotency/duplicate submission test to verify how repeated identical POSTs are handled
Introduce rate limiting tests to ensure proper throttling and error handling under high load
Add tests to validate caching headers and behavior (ETag, Cache-Control) for the response
Add a dedicated internal server error (500) scenario to ensure proper 500 handling and messaging beyond 503 scenarios
Consider a dedicated test for unauthenticated/unauthorized access with role-based permissions to broaden authorization coverage
